meta_value_1: MALAYSIAN FEDERATION OF THE DEAF (MFD) is a national level organization that oversees the Association of the Deaf in Malaysia. MFD aims to unite all Deaf organizations and related to the development and services of Deaf people to work together to fight for the rights and needs of Deaf people and to develop the socio-economy of Deaf people so that they can live on par with other people.
meta_value_2: MFD was registered by the Registrar of Societies on 8th December 1997 and is a PSK recognized by the Department of Social Welfare.
